title: News24.com | WATCH | Surviving Covid-19: Former paratrooper speaks out, backs Ramaphosa's extended lockdown
description: A Cape Town Covid-19 survivor has celebrated his victory over the deadly novel coronavirus - and publicly backed President Cyril Ramaphosa's extended lockdown.
content: A Cape Town Covid-19 survivor has celebrated his victory over the deadly novel coronavirus - and publicly backed President Cyril Ramaphosa's extended lockdown.Hector Eliott is the managing director of Bearfish Strategic Services in Hout Bay. What began as a r… [+698 chars]
